page.title: 05Services in Vernham Dean CP
page.content: The area has the normal services, but on a restricted basis. The milkman, eg delivers every other day. Other services include a daily paper delivery service, where the papers are delivered by car to the villages and distributed within by paper boys. The sunday papers are delivered by car by a private individual. The postal service includes a daily delivery service and a twice daily collection service. There is a bread and greengrocer delivery service available but these tend to be restricted and expensive. The villages of Upton and Vernham Dean each possess a general store, with the Upton store providing a very good service that compares pricewise with the supermarkets of Andover and a range that extends from computers to spirits.
